name: Across Time (Anna Beatriz Nakai Ricchetti, Gabriel Tury)
name_original: Across Time (Anna Beatriz Nakai Ricchetti, Gabriel Tury)
description:
A 2D top-down game. Made for a project at PUC-SP, for the second semester of the Digital Games course.

Members:

Anna Beatriz Nakai Ricchetti - Programmer and Game Designer

Gabriel Mendes Tury Guimarães - Programmer and Game Designer

Vitor Colasanto Gonzales - Programmer

Artur Bertini Malavolta dos Santos - Artist

Juan Sebastian Zuluaga Rios - Artist

Mateus Martins Torres - Artist and Game Designer
